pull.title: Fix for #156: UPnP segfault when no valid UPnP IGDs are found.
pull.body: This should fix #156 by only calling FreeUPNPUrls(urls) when the UPNP_GetValidIGD() value is non-zero.

events.message: Fix for #156: UPnP segfault when no valid UPnP IGDs are found.

events.body: Oops didn't see this when I added https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/165  Oh well that is this one + one other small thing.
